definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)

sentences.english: The law was put into effect through angels by a mediator.
sentences.chinese: 并且是借天使经中保之手设立的。

sentences.english: By so much is it a better agreement which we have through Jesus.
sentences.chinese: 既是起誓立的，耶稣就作了更美之约的中保。

sentences.english: Is there someone who can be my mediator, my vindicator before God?
sentences.chinese: 有没有人可以在神面前作为我的中保和辩护人？

sentences.english: He would have to reconcile God and man. He would be the great Mediator of history.
sentences.chinese: 他使人与上主和好，成为历史上最伟大的中保。

sentences.english: Return members with full names containing this value.
sentences.chinese: 返回登录名中保含此值的所有网站成员。

sentences.english: He is the only mediator between God and men.
sentences.chinese: 祂是神与人中间的唯一中保。

sentences.english: PICC Property companies pay compensation to policyholders of the county bus station.
sentences.chinese: 事后，中保财产公司向投保人县汽车站支付赔偿款。

sentences.english: Insurance against various risks shall be effected by Joint Venture with the People's Insurance Company of China.
sentences.chinese: 合营企业的各项保险均在中保财产保险公司投保。

definition: (third person pronoun for a divine being)
to maintain/to adhere to/to observe (an injunction etc)
